```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(vdemdata)
library(dplyr)
vdem_df <- vdem
vdem_21century <- vdem[(vdem$year >= 2000) & (vdem$year <= 2022), ]
```

```{r}
# Sort the subset by "country_name" and "year"
vdem_21century_df <- vdem_21century[order(vdem_21century$country_name, vdem_21century$year), ]

# Print the sorted subset
ncol(vdem_21century_df)

# Delete unneccesary columns

vdem_21century_df <- select(vdem_21century_df, -starts_with("e"))
ncol(vdem_21century_df)

vdem_21century_df <- select(vdem_21century_df, -c(4:14))
ncol(vdem_21century_df)

vdem_21century_df <- select(vdem_21century_df, -matches("codelow$|codehigh$"))
ncol(vdem_21century_df)
```
